title: My Life as a Dog = Mit Liv Som Hund
creator_credit: Lasse Hallstrom, Waldemar Bergendahl, FilmTeknik and Svensk Filmindustri
brief_description: A film about growing up in Sweden in 1959 as seen through the eyes of Ingemar. Ingemar has to confront death, sex, soccer, girls, abandonment and guilt. Based on the autobiographical novel by Reider Jonsson.
